overview_of_class: This course provides an introduction to the history of Russian art in the dual contexts of Russian literature and European culture. Our focus will be on interconnections between arts and ideology (medieval period to the beginning of the 20th century). This course will concentrate on Icons and their influence on Russian culture through the centuries.
name: Visual Art in the Context of Russian Culture
title: WCAS SLAVIC 278-1-20 Visual Art in the Context of Russian Culture

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course provides an introduction to the history of Russian art in the dual contexts of Russian literature and European culture. Our focus will be on interconnections between arts and ideology (medieval period to the beginning of the 20th century). This course will concentrate on Icons and their influence on Russian culture through the centuries.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: In-class midterm; choice of final exam or paper

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: All materials on Canvas or library reserve.

subject: SLAVIC
